Polisi Sebut Petinggi 'Produce X 101' Akui Manipulasi Voting
07 Nov 2019, 15:55 by , https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Polisi Korea menyebut salah satu petinggi acara 'Produce X 101' mengaku telah memanipulasi hasil akhir dua musim, Produce 48 dan Produce X 101. (Youtube/@ Mnet Official)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia -- Salah satu petinggi acara Produce X 101, PD Ahn Joon-young disebut mengaku telah memanipulasi hasil akhir dua musim Produce, Produce 48 dan Produce X 101. Polisi menyatakan PD Ahn Joon-young juga memberi tahu bentuk suap dan hiburan yang diterima selama ini.Polisi meyakini PD Ahn Joon-young menerima ragam bentuk suap dari sejumlah agensi di pusat hiburan dewasa kawasan Gangnam.Direktur Produksi CJENM itu disebut telah menerima suap tersebut lebih dari 40 kali sejak Juli 2018 yang setara dengan 100 juta won atau sekitar Rp1,2 miliar.PD Ahn Joon-young telah ditahan sejak 5 November atas dugaan penipuan karena memanipulasi peringkat acara Produce 48 dan Produce X 101. Hal itu dilakukan supaya trainee dari sejumlah agensi bisa debut dalam X1.Meski demikian, PD Ahn Joon-young menyatakan tak ikut campur dan memanipulasi peringkat dalam dua musim awal Produce 101 yang melahirkan I.O.I dan WANNA ONE pada 2016 dan 2017.Selain menahan dan mendapatkan pengakuanPDAhnJoon-young, polisi juga menggerebek agensi yang diduga peringkat binaannya dimanipulasi petinggi acara itu. Melansir SBS, Polisi juga terus menyelidiki program-program Mnet lainnya yang menggunakan sistem perhitungan suara.Polisi juga menahan petinggi Produce X 101 lainnya yakni Chief Producer Kim Yong-bum. Mereka juga sempat menahan PD Lee serta Wakil Presiden Starship Entertainment Kim sebelum akhirnya dilepaskan.Sebelumnya, lima agensi telah diperiksa kepolisian. Salah satunya adalah Starship Entertainment yang menaungi Minhee dan Hyeongjun X1. Polisi juga sempat mengamankan ponsel staf sebagai barang bukti.Selain itu polisi turut memeriksa jika ada kecurangan yang dilakukan pada acara Produce musim sebelumnya, serta acara Idol School yang juga dibuat oleh Mnet.Ajang pencarian bakat Produce X 101 dianggap sebagai salah satu kompetisi idola K-Pop yang paling sukses dalam 10 tahun terakhir. Tidak hanya itu, ajang ini juga menjadi salah satu jalan yang menjanjikan untuk para bintang K-Pop mengawali karier. (chri/end)

Police Call Officials 'Produce X 101' Admits Voting Manipulation
Nov 7 2019, 15:55 by, https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Korean police said one of the officials of the program 'Produce X 101' claimed to have manipulated the final results of the two seasons, Produce 48 and Produce X 101. (Youtube / @ Mnet Official)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia - One of the top brass of Produce X 101, PD Ahn Joon-young is said to have confessed to manipulating the final results of the two Produce, Produce 48 and Produce X 101 seasons. The police stated that PD Ahn Joon-young also informed the form of bribery and entertainment The police believe PD Ahn Joon-young has received various forms of bribes from a number of agencies in the adult entertainment center in the Gangnam area. The CJENM Production Director is said to have received bribes more than 40 times since July 2018 which is equivalent to 100 million won. Rp1.2 billion.PD Ahn Joon-young has been detained since November 5 for alleged fraud for manipulating the rankings of Produce 48 and Produce X 101. This was done so that trainees from a number of agencies could debut in X1. Even so, PD Ahn Joon-young stated that they did not interfere and manipulate the ranks in the first two seasons of Produce 101, which gave birth to IOI and WANNA ONE in 2016 and 2017. In addition to holding back and getting recognition from DAhnJoon- young, the police also raided the agency whose alleged ranking was manipulated by officials of the event. Launching SBS, the Police also continue to investigate other Mnet programs that use a vote counting system. The police also arrested another Produce X 101 official, Chief Producer Kim Yong-bum. They also briefly detained PD Lee and Starship Entertainment Kim's Vice President before being released. Previously, five agencies had been questioned by the police. One of them is Starship Entertainment which houses Minhee and Hyeongjun X1. The police also had time to secure staff's cellphones as evidence. In addition, the police also examined if there was fraud committed at the previous season's Produce event, as well as the Idol School event which was also made by Mnet. The Produce X 101 talent search event was considered as one of the K-idol competitions. The most successful pop in the last 10 years. Not only that, this event also became one of the promising avenues for K-Pop stars to start their careers. (chri / end)
